name: Telecommunication Equipment Type
description: Codes specifying the type of telecommunications equipment or device used for communication

values.definition: Facsimile transmission device for document communication
Data communication device for computer-to-computer transmission
Paging device for receiving short messages
Email or other internet-based communication method
X.400 standard electronic mail system address
Text-based communication device for hearing-impaired individuals

vendorVariations.epic: Supports standard codes with additional mobile device categorization
vendorVariations.cerner: Standard implementation with validation for modern communication types
vendorVariations.allscripts: Supports common equipment types (PH, FX, CP, Internet)

generationRules.realistic: Telephone and cellular devices most common, internet addresses increasingly important, fax still used in healthcare settings
